originalText.text: I‚Äôve had my locs for 11 years and this is the first year that I‚Äôve had someone else touch them. Love Peace and Locs match the energy that I‚Äôm looking for as well as the expertise. If you‚Äôre someone like me where your hair has been a journey and blessing then this is the place to come. Ms. Cee is my stylist and she‚Äôs exceptional. I feel free when I leave and the customer service is beyond recognition. As long as I keep flowing then this will be the only place that I‚Äôm going.

originalText.text: The absolute best salon experience I've ever had. This is my second visit and it's only gotten better. Services were beyond amazing. The definitely are locticians who know what they are doing. The atmosphere is so calm and peaceful, makes you feel like you're at family's house instead of a salon. Everyone was polite and friendly. I would and have reccomended this place for others looking to get their locs done. Thank you for such an experience and bringing my hair back to life üò©üíõ.

originalText.text:
Love, peace and locs is one of the most tranquil places to get your hair done. Cee does an excellent job from creating an online service that makes it easy to book appointments, to creating a space that feels welcoming, calm and endearing.

There‚Äôs a lot of fuss and stress when it comes to stylists and walking into an establishment these days and you honestly don‚Äôt have to worry about that here. It‚Äôs either quiet or chill music is playing at a reasonable volume. Other hairdressers and the barbers are friendly.

The services provided from loc soaking/detoxing/steaming to styles are impeccable. She is also excellent at repairing locs. Once you start going here it‚Äôs easy to see why these reviews are all so high. Thanks for the creating a space that allows me to enjoy getting my hair done & also keeps my anxiety low!

originalText.text: Customer service is key and attention to details is on point. Warm and cozy atmosphere has a spa type feel.  Cee made sure I was comfortable and happy from consultation to the end of my appointment.  Can't wait to book my birthday appointment. Holla at Love + Peace & Locs
